resources.string: You use Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 and Microsoft .NET Framework 4 to create an application. The application connects to a Microsoft SQL Server database. You use Entity SQL of the ADO .NET Entity Framework to retrieve data from the database. You need to define a custom function in the conceptual model. You also need to ensure that the function calculates a value based on properties of the object. Which two XML element types should you use? (Each correct answer presents part of the solution Choose two.)
